Sheekh Kebabs¶

Ingredients¶

  • 2 green chillies, desseded and finely chopped
  • 1 teaspoon grated fresh root ginger
  • 2 garlic cloves, crushed
  • 3 tablespoons of chopped fresh corriander
  • 2 tablespoons chopped mint
  • 1 teaspoon cumin seeds
  • 1 tablespoon of vegtable oil
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom seeds
  • 500g minced lamb
  • salt to taste

Method¶

  1. Put the chillies, ginger, garlic, corriander, mint, cumin, oil, ground cloves and cardamomom into a food processor and process until fairly smooth.
  2. Transfer to a mixing bowl add the lamb and salt and mix well. Using your hands divide the mixture into 12 portions cover and chill for 30 minutes
  3. Lightly oil 12 flat metal skewers and shape a portion of the kebab mixture around each skewer, forming a sausage shape
  4. Cook over hot coals for 304 minutes on each side
